Detailed Description

Encapsulates a smooth-scale legacy binding.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Default Constructor.

DzLegacySmoothScale::DzLegacySmoothScale ( DzBone *  driver,
DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis  axis 
)

Creates a Smooth Scale parameter for driver on axis.

Parameters:
driver The bone whose scaling is applied by this parameter.
axis The axis that is used to calculate weights for this parameter.
DzLegacySmoothScale::DzLegacySmoothScale ( DzBone *  driver,
DzLegacyJointParam::ParamAxis  axis,
float  loEnd,
float  loStart,
float  hiStart,
float  hiEnd 
)

Creates a Smooth Scale parameter for driver on axis with the given scaling zones.

Parameters:
driver The bone whose scaling is applied by this parameter.
axis The axis that is used to calculate weights for this parameter.
hiEnd The largest outside end of the scaling zones.
hiStart The largest inside end of the scaling zones.
loStart The smallest inside end of the scaling zones.
loEnd The smallest outside end of the scaling zones.
DzLegacySmoothScale::~DzLegacySmoothScale (  )  [virtual]

Destructor.

DzLegacySmoothScale::DzLegacySmoothScale ( const DzInFile *  file  ) 

For internal use only.

This constructor is called by the Framework when loading from a file so that certain initializations can be skipped that will happen later in the file load process.

Parameters:
file The file from which this object was loaded.

void DzLegacySmoothScale::getSmoothZones ( float &  loEnd,
float &  loStart,
float &  hiStart,
float &  hiEnd 
) const

Sets the given variables to the value of the smooth zone paramaters for this joint.

Parameters:
hiEnd This will be set to the largest outside end of the scaling zones.
hiStart This will be set to the largest inside end of the scaling zones.
loStart This will be set to the smallest inside end of the scaling zones.
loEnd This will be set to the smallest outside end of the scaling zones.
See also:
setSmoothZones()
bool DzLegacySmoothScale::hiValid (  )  const
Returns:
true if the high zone (hiStart-hiEnd) is valid (i.e. the values are in range to be applied)

void DzLegacySmoothScale::setApplyZones ( bool  onOff  ) 

Sets whether or not the smooth scale zones are applied to the joint parameter.

Parameters:
onOff If true, the smooth scaling zones will be applied, if false, no smooth scaling will be applied.
See also:
applyZones()
